document.full_text: the japanese government and the democratic party of japan (dpj) are evaluating options to redevelop the areas hit by the earthquake in march through property securitizations and public-private partnerships, business daily nikkei said.
document.title: japan looks at private funds for quake-hit areas: nikkei
lines_and_colors: the japanese government and the democratic party of japan (dpj) are evaluating options to redevelop the areas hit by the earthquake in march through property securitizations and public-private partnerships, business daily nikkei said.
